column5: Private bedroom with a full bathroom available in a quiet condo located in the wooded Lake Highlands neighborhood in Dallas. This room has its own private entry from the outside stairwell as well as your own full bathroom. This location is great since it has easy access to 75 and 635. White Rock, SMU and NorthPark Mall which are all nearby. I have cable TV as well as a 200mB/s internet connection. I do have a cat and a dog who are both small (about 8-9lbs each) and well trained. LGBT Friendly.
